channel.title: Some bugs I found in the new Crossfire update.
channel.description:
Hello!
So, today I played the new updated version of Black Mesa. I came across some glitches. Some tiny, some major
To make it easier to read, I made a nice and compact list of the things that I saw.
* On some maps, the text "Node graph out of date. Rebuilding..." appears. This usually only happens in Gmod when someone screws up the node graphing for the NPC's. * [url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=581224512']The shotgun appears to be angled incorrectly[/url] (Takes you to screenshot) * [url='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/357273262803510722/22705EA79A083A30A01BE9B92ECD937204E4C6BC/']The player spawn point of the power generator map in the chapter "Blast Pit" is... well... outside of this world...[/url] (Takes you to screenshot) These glitches are pretty weird. Please fix them.
- MijnGezicht

item.title: Some bugs I found in the new Crossfire update.
item.dc:creator: foxrock88
item.description:
Fr0z3n:
foxrock88:

I keep getting the “Node graph out of date. Rebuilding…” as well. Maybe this is why some load times are a bit longer than before or that trying to load certain levels while holding the purple hat leads to le crash.

Ah. Are you getting crashes while carrying the hat, but not while carrying it? Knowing if you crash only when the hat is with you, would help us a lot.

Just tested it. The game crashes while trying to leave Blast Pit down the center shaft whether or not I’m holding the purp hat.

Here’s a link to the dump file that generates when the Blast Pit exit causes the crash:
https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BxFiaIZURc74ZGZ0cEsxcmxVc2s&usp=sharing

Read full topic

item.title: Some bugs I found in the new Crossfire update.
item.dc:creator: MijnGezicht
item.description:
Fr0z3n:

These have been noted. Thanks!

Thanks. I only made a slight mistake I just noticed.

The chapter that the spawn error appears in is not Power Up. I meant Blast Pit. Sorry for the mix up.

Read full topic

item.source: Some bugs I found in the new Crossfire update.

item.title: Some bugs I found in the new Crossfire update.
item.dc:creator: MijnGezicht
item.description:
Hello!

So, today I played the new updated version of Black Mesa. I came across some glitches. Some tiny, some major

To make it easier to read, I made a nice and compact list of the things that I saw.

  • On some maps, the text “Node graph out of date. Rebuilding…” appears. This usually only happens in Gmod when someone screws up the node graphing for the NPC’s.
  • The shotgun appears to be angled incorrectly (Takes you to screenshot)
  • The player spawn point of the power generator map in the chapter “Blast Pit” is… well… outside of this world… (Takes you to screenshot)
    These glitches are pretty weird. Please fix them.
  • MijnGezicht

Read full topic
item.source: Some bugs I found in the new Crossfire update.
